lom:description.lom:string: The low percentage of girls in computer science continues to be a cause for concern. As computers become more pervasive in all aspects of our society, girls without computer experience will encounter many problems in their future careers. This article examines the results from two successful programs designed to attract and retain women in technology related courses. Keywords: barriers, gender equity, environment, projects to increase female participation, education, women and information technology

lom:title.lom:string: Research On Young Women In Computer Science: Promoting High Technology For Girls
